name: walk-doss-trento
description: Needed to activate contextual links class group-image class colorbox data-cbox-img-attrs '{title: , alt: }' data-colorbox-gallery gallery-node-30910-gxJ3uPl8Zp0 href 0fbn9-9x title img alt src M8soQvTa title //a class group-content class a href IwAR2mH2Ow9zs3_ZLTipYXX.../aspan) to enjoy a beautiful view of the city from above and visit the mausoleum to the national hero. /p pspanIt is a very easy walk. Well be on top of the DOSS in about 30 minutes, and then we will just chill out there, sunbathing on the lawn, playing football, music, cards or whatever you will want to bring with you. br/ spanAfter the walk we could even go to have a hot chocolate together or something to drink. /p pspanComfortable shoes, a towel and some snacks are highly recommended. /p pspanYou dont have to register, but it would be nice if you could click attend if you come, so we can see how many well be, more or less. The whole trip is completely free!/p pspanThe meeting point will be at Piazza Duomo at 14 o'clock. We will tell ya some secret stories on the way to Doss./p pspanThe event could be postponed due to weather conditions! br/ spanHowever we will keep you up to date!/p class group-secondary class date-display-single03/03/2019 - class date-display-rangespan class date-display-start14:00 to class date-display-end17:00 class countryItaly class item-listul class textformatter-listli class first lastEveryone is invited./li /ul
location: Italy DOSS , in Piazza at Duomo
